title: The Knight of Elizabeth is looking for members gold and up and we have gold and plat members
body:
The Knight of Elizabeth is looking for members gold and up and we have gold and plat members we really need 1 or 2 players more on our team and we would like your help to rise to the top so join now

Thank You
